2. Gaggia Cadorna Prestige - This super-automatic espresso maker features 14 drink presets, 4 user profiles, and an integrated milk carafe. Its color display and one-touch functionality make it perfect for coffee lovers who want convenience and customization.

3. DeLonghi Dinamica LatteCrema - With 18 drink recipes, a conical grinder, dual Thermoblock system, and a self-cleaning milk frother, this fully automatic espresso machine delivers smart café quality at home.

4. Jura E6 - This espresso machine offers a Professional Aroma Grinder, Easy Cappuccino function, and a 2.8" color display. With optimized aroma extraction and intuitive controls, it's ideal for cappuccino lovers seeking premium coffee at a touch.

5. Nespresso Creatista and Lattissima - These machines are known for easy use and premium quality. They offer a range of capsule-based coffee options, which might not provide the same level of customization as the other machines on this list.

6. Philips 3200 Series espresso machine - Although primarily an espresso machine, it also features LatteGo for one-touch cappuccino, espresso, and iced coffee. It's suitable for users who want simplicity and variety at home.

7. Hamilton Beach FlexBrew - While this appliance doesn't fit your request for an espresso machine, it offers flexible single-serve or full carafe brewing using K-Cup® pods or ground coffee. This could be a more affordable option for daily coffee brewing.

With these recommendations, you can choose the coffee maker that best meets your needs and preferences for customization
